Co-Founder

OUR LOCATIONS

BALI INDONESIA

Known as Indonesia's cultural centre, Bali is characterised by it's distinctive rainforest and beautiful terraced rice paddies. Ancient holy sites, Hindu temples and shrines can be found dotted around the area. It's also known for its amazing restaurants, cafes and markets.

EXPLORE

SAYULTA MEXICO

Home to breath-taking beaches, amazing activities and rich Mexican culture, Sayulita is about 25 miles north of Puerto Vallarta. Probably best described as a chilled out surf town, Sayulita makes a perfect location to run our 10 day bootcamps.

EXPLORE

Luxury pool villas in beautiful locations around the world

We've tried to forget everything we knew about what a school was and reimagined what a school could be. The result is multiple campuses that can be found in incredible locations around the world.

We believe the best learning happens in an exciting and stimulating environment that allows you to take your mind of everyday living.

Learn in the best environment possible

Apart from being set in beautiful locations, we take care of all the small stuff that usually clogs up your spare time. Our private chef makes sure all your meals are nutritious and most importantly taste amazing.

You don't have to worry about dishes or washing and all your transport needs are taken care of. It's our job to make sure you're in the best frame of mind for learning.

OUR LOCATIONS

BALI INDONESIA

Known as Bali's cultural centre, Ubud is characterised by its distinctive rainforest and beautiful terraced rice paddies. Ancient holy sites, Hindu temples and shrines can be found dotted around the area. It is also known for its amazing restaurants, cafes and markets.

SAYULITA MEXICO

Home to breath-taking beaches, amazing activities and rich Mexican culture, Sayulita is about 25 miles north of Puerto Vallarta. Probably best described as a chilled out surf town, Sayulita makes a perfect location to run our 10 day bootcamps.
